TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FontFamily extends System.Object

summary.span: 代表一系列的相關字型。

span.span: Represents a family of related fonts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字型家族是一份字樣，共用相同的系列名稱，例如"Times New Roman"，但其不同功能。A font family is a set of typefaces that share the same family name, such as "Times New Roman", but that differ in features. 這些功能的差異包括，例如斜體、 和，例如粗體。These feature differences include , such as italic, and , such as bold. ![字型](~/add/media/fonts.PNG "字型")![Fonts](~/add/media/fonts.PNG "Fonts") 成員的"Times New Roman"的字型系列字樣的範例Example of typefaces that are members of the "Times New Roman" font family 大部分[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]項目，例如並，提供屬性，可用來指定控制項的文字內容的字型。Most [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements, such as and , provide a property that can be used to specify a font for the text content of a control. 設定該屬性與定義字型值。You define the font by setting that property with a value. 下列範例示範如何參考中的字型，[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]和程式碼中。The following examples show how to reference a font, in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] and in code. [!code-csharp[FontSnippets#FontFallbackSnippet3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/CSharp/FontFamilySnippets.xaml.cs#fontfallbacksnippet3)] [!code-vb[FontSnippets#FontFallbackSnippet3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/visualbasic/fontfamilysnippets.xaml.vb#fontfallbacksnippet3)] [!code-xaml[FontSnippets#FontFallbackSnippet3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/CSharp/FontFamilySnippets.xaml#fontfallbacksnippet3)] 在上述範例中，字型參考時，"漫畫 San MS"，指其*易記名稱*。In the preceding example, the font that is referenced, "Comic Sans MS", is referred to by its *friendly name*. 此外，在此範例中的字型被假設為系統字型集合中。Also, in this example the font is assumed to be in the system font collection. ## 指定替代的目錄中的字型Specifying Fonts in Alternate Directories A[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]應用程式可以指定一個目錄，不包含系統字型集合，來解析字型參考的目錄。A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] application can specify a directory, other than the directory that contains the systems font collection, for resolving font references. 字型的易記名稱可以指定絕對[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]值解析字型參考，如下列所示[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]和程式碼範例。The friendly name of the font can specify an absolute [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] value to resolve the font reference, as shown in the following [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] and code examples. [!code-csharp[FontSnippets#FontPackageSnippet6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/CSharp/FontPackageSnippets.xaml.cs#fontpackagesnippet6)] [!code-vb[FontSnippets#FontPackageSnippet6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/visualbasic/fontpackagesnippets.xaml.vb#fontpackagesnippet6)] [!code-xaml[FontSnippets#FontPackageSnippet6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/CSharp/FontPackageSnippets.xaml#fontpackagesnippet6)] 字型的易記名稱也可以指定相對[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]值，而這需要基底[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]解析字型參考。The friendly name of the font can also specify a relative [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] value, which requires a base [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] to resolve the font reference. 的屬性物件會對應至基底[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]值。The property of the object corresponds to the base [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] value. 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立基底所組成的字型參考[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]值和相對[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]值。The following code example shows how to create a font reference that is composed of a base [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] value and a relative [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] value. [!code-csharp[FontSnippets#FontPackageSnippet7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/CSharp/FontPackageSnippets.xaml.cs#fontpackagesnippet7)] [!code-vb[FontSnippets#FontPackageSnippet7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/visualbasic/fontpackagesnippets.xaml.vb#fontpackagesnippet7)] 您可以使用基底[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]時參考字型封裝為應用程式一部分的值。You can use a base [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] value when you reference a font that is packaged as part of the application. 例如，基底[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]值可以是 「 //application" [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]，可讓您參考會封裝為應用程式資源的字型。For example, the base [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] value can be a "pack://application" [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)], which lets you reference fonts that are packaged as application resources. 下列程式碼範例顯示的字型參考所組成的基底[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]值和相對[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]值。The following code example shows a font reference that is composed of a base [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] value and a relative [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] value. [!code-csharp[FontSnippets#FontPackageSnippet2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/CSharp/FontPackageSnippets.xaml.cs#fontpackagesnippet2)] [!code-vb[FontSnippets#FontPackageSnippet2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/visualbasic/fontpackagesnippets.xaml.vb#fontpackagesnippet2)] 當指定為在標記中，基底屬性[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]一律隱含的值 — 它的值是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]頁面。When a is specified as an attribute in markup, the base [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] value is always implied—its value is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] page. 隱含的基底[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]值搭配相對於[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]易記名稱字串，若要取得的字型位置中的值。The implied base [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] value is used with the relative [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] value in the friendly name string to obtain the location of the font. 在下列[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]範例中，請注意，相對[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]值會使用"。 /"表示法中，這表示 「 在目前的資料夾 」 的基底[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]值。In the following [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] example, notice that the relative [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] value uses the "./" notation, which means "in the current folder" of the base [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] value. [!code-xaml[FontSnippets#FontPackageSnippet1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/CSharp/FontPackageSnippets.xaml#fontpackagesnippet1)] A[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]應用程式可以將字型封裝為內容項目，為資源項目或程式庫資源項目。A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] application can package fonts as either a content item, a resource item, or a library resource item. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[將字型與應用程式一起封裝](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/packaging-fonts-with-applications.md)。For more information, see [Packaging Fonts with Applications](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/packaging-fonts-with-applications.md). ## 字型遞補Font Fallback 字型遞補指以外的用戶端應用程式會選取的字型的字型自動替換。Font fallback refers to the automatic substitution of a font other than the font that is selected by the client application. 有兩個主要的原因，字型遞補叫用的原因：There are two primary reasons why font fallback is invoked: - 用戶端應用程式所指定的字型不存在於系統中。The font that is specified by the client application does not exist on the system. - 用戶端應用程式所指定的字型不包含圖像 （glyph） 所需來呈現文字。The font that is specified by the client application does not contain the glyphs that are required to render text. 在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]，字型後援機制使用預設後援字型家族，"Global User Interface"，做為替代字型。In[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], the font fallback mechanism uses the default fallback font family, "Global User Interface", as the substitute font. 這種字型定義為複合字型，其檔案名稱為 「 GlobalUserInterface.CompositeFont"。This font is defined as a composite font, whose file name is "GlobalUserInterface.CompositeFont". 如需複合字型的詳細資訊，請參閱本主題中的複合字型 」 一節。For more information about composite fonts, see the Composite Fonts section in this topic. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]字型後援機制會取代先前[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)]字型替代技術。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] font fallback mechanism replaces previous [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] font substitution technologies. ## 程式碼中定義字型遞補的順序Defining a Font Fallback Sequence in Code 您可以在程式碼，可讓您定義替代字型中定義字型遞補的順序。You can define a font fallback sequence in your code, which lets you define an alternate font. 當您建立物件，提供多個字型家族的名稱，以逗號分隔，如參數，例如"新細明體，新細明體"。When you create a object, provide multiple font family names, separated by commas, for the parameter, such as "Comic Sans MS, Verdana". 在此情況下，如果無法使用"漫畫 San MS"字樣的圖像時，就會使用從"新細明體"字樣的圖像 （glyph）。In this case, if the glyphs from the "Comic Sans MS" typeface are not available, glyphs from the "Verdana" typeface are used. 如果"漫畫 San MS"或"新細明體"都不具有必要的字符，後援字型系列字樣的是，這是 「 全域使用者介面 」 預設使用。If neither "Comic Sans MS" nor "Verdana" have the required glyphs, the fallback font family of the typeface is used, which is "Global User Interface" by default. 下列範例示範如何以定義字型遞補的順序，[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]和程式碼中。The following examples show how to define a font fallback sequence, in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] and in code. [!code-csharp[FontSnippets#FontFallbackSnippet1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/CSharp/FontFamilySnippets.xaml.cs#fontfallbacksnippet1)] [!code-vb[FontSnippets#FontFallbackSnippet1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/visualbasic/fontfamilysnippets.xaml.vb#fontfallbacksnippet1)] [!code-xaml[FontSnippets#FontFallbackSnippet1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/CSharp/FontFamilySnippets.xaml#fontfallbacksnippet1)] 字型後援序列中的任何一個可以指定字型的位置。Any one of the fonts in the fallback sequence can specify font locations. 在下列範例中，"Pericles Light 」 參照為應用程式資源，而"新細明體"參考做為系統字型集合成員。In the following examples, "Pericles Light" is referenced as an application resource, and "Verdana" is referenced as a system font collection member. [!code-csharp[FontSnippets#FontFallbackSnippet2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/CSharp/FontFamilySnippets.xaml.cs#fontfallbacksnippet2)] [!code-vb[FontSnippets#FontFallbackSnippet2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/visualbasic/fontfamilysnippets.xaml.vb#fontfallbacksnippet2)] [!code-xaml[FontSnippets#FontFallbackSnippet2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/CSharp/FontFamilySnippets.xaml#fontfallbacksnippet2)] ## 複合字型Composite Fonts [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]平台提供的複合字型功能，以允許建構完整範圍的多語系字型，並避免顯示遺漏的字符。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] platform provides a composite font feature to allow the construction of full range multilingual fonts, and to avoid displaying missing glyphs. 複合字型取代[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]字型連結、 字型遞補、 字型繫結、 字型關聯和終端使用者定義的字元 (EUDC) 的機制。Composite fonts replace the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] font linking, font fallback, font binding, font association, and end-user-defined characters (EUDC) mechanisms. 複合字型系列是應用程式可透過和建構函式就像任何其他的字型家族。A composite font family is available to applications through the and constructors just like any other font family. 每個複合字型家族名稱為，，和其他字型，可以提供它的名稱，以多種語言的當地語系化的變化。Each composite font family is named, and, as with other fonts, can provide localized variants of its name in multiple languages. 下列標記範例示範如何定義複合字型家族，為磁碟檔案。The following markup example shows how a composite font family can be defined as a disk file. 這個檔案可以儲存在預設[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)]字型目錄的任何其他已安裝字型，或可以在任何位置參考，包含其[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]時依名稱參考的系列。This file can be stored in the default [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] font directory as with any other installed font, or can be referenced in any location by including its [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] when referencing the family by name. 下列範例示範中的字型家族標記 」。CompositeFont"檔案。The following example shows the font family markup in a ".CompositeFont" file. [!code-xaml[CompositeFontMarkup#CF](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CompositeFontMarkup/CS/comp.xaml#cf)] 下列四個複合字型會出現在預設的 Windows 字型目錄，為 WPF 安裝的一部分。The following four composite fonts appear in the default Windows font directory as part of the WPF installation. |字型Font|注意Notes| |----------|-----------| |GlobalMonospace.CompositeFontGlobalMonospace.CompositeFont|使用等寬字型，例如，"Courier New"會呈現文字的拉丁字元。Renders text by using a monospace font, for example, "Courier New" for Latin characters.| |GlobalSanSerif.CompositeFontGlobalSanSerif.CompositeFont|使用 sans serif 字型，例如，[Arial] 的拉丁字元，以呈現文字。Renders text by using a sans serif font, for example, "Arial" for Latin characters.| |GlobalSerif.CompositeFontGlobalSerif.CompositeFont|使用有襯線字型，例如"Times New Roman"會呈現文字的拉丁字元。Renders text by using a serif font, for example, "Times New Roman" for Latin characters.| |GlobalUserInterface.CompositeFontGlobalUserInterface.CompositeFont|會呈現所使用的預設字型，例如"Times New Roman"的拉丁字元的文字。Renders text by using a default font, for example, "Times New Roman" for Latin characters.| ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化匿名 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of an anonymous class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您想要以程式設計方式建立的複合字型，請使用此預設建構函式。Use this default constructor when you want to create a composite font programmatically. 這表示您沒有指定字型家族名稱的建構函式，但您必須填入中的集合和之前使用建構的執行個體的集合。This means that you do not have to specify a font family name for the constructor, but you must populate the collections in the and collections prior to using the constructed instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string familyName) cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: familyName
param.span: 組成新 的系列名稱。

span.span: The family name or names that comprise the new .

param.span: 多個系列名稱應該以逗號分隔。

span.span: Multiple family names should be separated by commas.

summary.span: 從指定的字型系列名稱初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class from the specified font family name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定在每個姓氏`familyName`前面參數可以是任一個目錄的位置參考或[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]。Each family name that is specified in the `familyName` parameter can be preceded by a location reference to either a directory or a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]. 位置參考以井字號分隔系列名稱 (`#`) 字元。The location reference is separated from the family name by a pound (`#`) character. 中指定的多個系列名稱`familyName`參數必須以逗號分隔。Multiple family names that are specified in the `familyName` parameter must be separated by commas. 每個系列可以是實際的字型直接代表一組共用相同的系列名稱、 字型檔案，或可以是複合字型檔案中定義的系列名稱的參考。Each family can be a real font that directly represents a set of font files that share the same family name, or can be a reference to a family name that is defined in a composite font file. 當識別出多個系列時，第二個和後續的字型系列會作為後援的家族，處理的第一個的字型系列不支援的字碼指標。When multiple families are identified, the second and subsequent font families serve as fallback families, handling code points that are not supported by the first font family. 第一個的字型系列不支援每個字碼指標，會輪流檢查每個後續的系列。For every code point that is not supported by the first font family, each subsequent family is checked in turn. ## Examples [!code-csharp[FontSnippets#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#103)] [!code-vb[FontSnippets#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#103)]

span.span: cannot be .

summary.span: 從指定的字型系列名稱和選擇性基底[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] 值，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class from the specified font family name and an optional base [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `familyName`值可以指定相對[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]的值，也需要基底[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]解析字型參考。The `familyName` value can specify a relative [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] value, which requires a base [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] to resolve the font reference. `baseUri`值可以是`null`。The `baseUri` value can be `null`. ## Examples 下列程式碼顯示字型參考所組成的基底[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]值和相對[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]值。The following code shows a font reference that is composed of a base [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] value and a relative [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] value. summary.span: 取得或設定基準線與字元儲存格頂端之間的距離。

span.span: Gets or sets the distance between the baseline and the character cell top.

value.span: ，表示基準線與字元儲存格頂端之間的距離，以佔字型 em 大小的分數表示。

span.span: A that indicates the distance between the baseline and the character cell top, expressed as a fraction of the font em size.

summary.span: 取得或設定用來解析字型系列名稱的基底[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]。

span.span: Gets the base [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] that is used to resolve a font family name.
A value of type .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回值是`null`如果字型家族名稱不會依賴基底[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]來解析字型參考。The return value is `null` if the font family name does not rely on a base [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for resolving the font reference. 若要擷取用來建構字型系列名稱物件，請使用屬性。To retrieve the font family name that is used to construct the object, use the property. ## Examples 下列範例顯示的擷取結果屬性從物件。The following example shows the results of retrieving the property from a object.
